entry.em: ..FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING

entry.data:
SHOWERS WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY PRODUCE HEAVY RAINFALL
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 50
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

A SLIGHT CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
SHOWERS
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY PRODUCE HEAVY RAINFALL
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 25 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
